edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer

Class ModelInitializerLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer.ModelInitializerLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loader, Configurable

    public class ModelInitializerLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loader
    an acoustic model loader that initializes models

    Mixture weights and transition probabilities are maintained in logMath log base,
